title: Provision for Priests and Promise of a Prophet
summary: Deuteronomy 18 provides for the priests and Levites and forbids occult practices. God promises to raise up a prophet like Moses, who will speak His words to the people.

faq.question: What practices are forbidden in this chapter?
faq.answer: Divination, sorcery, witchcraft, omens, mediums, and consulting the dead.
